Articles.Content: Just joined this place, don\'t have the $15 to buy a full installation yet, but very eager demo enthusiast.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

As most people here will tell you, it will be the best spent $15 you\'ll find anywhere.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Yep.

PM me if you need help!

I\'ve already made an orbital rocket: the Spacefinger IV. It\'s vanilla though, and until I can get mo\' money to buy the new version, I\'m thinking about mods. What would you suggest for Spacefinger V?

As most people here will tell you, it will be the best spent $15 you\'ll find anywhere.

Assuming you have a decent computer. It gets a little irritating flying around at 2fps.

Anyway, hello!
